sicsim.network.peers
Class BandwidthPeer

java.lang.Object
  sicsim.network.peers.AbstractPeer
      sicsim.network.peers.BandwidthPeer

public abstract class BandwidthPeer
extends AbstractPeer

Peers simulated in the system have to implement this abstract class, if they want to have upload/download bandwidth in their links.

startSendData

protected boolean startSendData(NodeId destId,
                                java.lang.String msg)
Starts to send data from this peer to the destination.

Parameters:
destId - The destination peer.
msg - The message to the destination peer.
Returns:
'true' if there is enough available upload bandwidth on this peer to sends data, otherwise returns 'false'.

stopSendData

protected void stopSendData(NodeId destId,
                            java.lang.String msg)
Stops to send data from this peer to the destination.

Parameters:
destId - The destination peer.
msg - The message to the destination peer.

getStateString

public java.lang.String getStateString(java.lang.Class<?> peer,
                                       java.lang.Class<?> link)
Returns the status of the peer that should be saved. This method should be called inside the 'toString' of a peer who inheritance from this peer. The local information of child class should be added at the end of the returning string of this method.

Overrides:
getStateString in class AbstractPeer
Parameters:
peer - The class of peer.
link - The class of link.
Returns:
A string that contains the information of status of this peer.
